website_summaries.verdict: Stunning and stylish, the U-shaped decanter from Zalik offers beauty and function at a great price. Holds two 750 milliliter bottles of wine, making it ideal for entertaining, with a distinct, horn-like shape to ease pouring and minimize splash. Unique design, plus you can return leftover wine back into the bottle, with the smaller-than-average pouring spout.
pros: Very large aerating chamber (1,800-milliliter capacity), thin glass gives an upscale feel
Lead-free glass and lifetime replacement guarantee
cons: Smaller base-bottom may make it difficult to stand up properly, so place carefully, and note that a bump to the table could knock it over easily
Taller than other decanters, which can make storage a challenge

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, strange-looking, and surprisingly practical
customer_reviews.text: This is kind of weird-looking but I like it! Elegant in its strangeness. I've tried a more standard shape of decanter in the past () and had trouble with spills. The good thing about this horn design is that it makes it a lot easier to pour the wine into a glass or back in the bottle. The narrow spout allows a lot more certainty about where the wine is going to go. So it's working for me.
customer_reviews.author: R. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful and effective crystal wine decanter
customer_reviews.text: I love the style and I love how well it actually airates the wine! I poured a nice red wine that we frequently enjoy into the decanter, approximately about half an hour prior to serving, and the wine was smoother than I had ever experienced it before. My only concern is how easily this decanter could be broken, so we store it in its original packaging and are very careful while using it. That being said, we love it!!
customer_reviews.author: David R Bobbe

customer_reviews.title: Great price, unique piece!
customer_reviews.text: I love this decanter. I was a bit nervous from other reviewers about the thickness but this glass is plenty thick. You do need to be careful with it, I get the sense it could break somewhat easily but it’s definitely not like spiegelau glass thin. I love it, and it absolutely is effective at aerating wine, particularly if you grip the U portion and give it a bit of a shake.
customer_reviews.author: RandomTexan

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and works well
customer_reviews.text: If you are going to decant, why not have it be attractive too? We were doing a vertical wine tasting an needed a third decanter. We bought this one for our third bottle and it the nicest design and experience. Attractive and easy to pour.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful decanter. Was a gift for a wedding and ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful decanter. Was a gift for a wedding and the couple just loved it. Very good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a hostess gift. It is very delicate and elegant!
customer_reviews.author: K. Lambie

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Love! Gifted it to my coworker and it was a hit.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely looking & effective
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful decanter that's very easy to pour from and is effective for the purposes it was designed for. Of course one must use it for some time to evaluate how durable it is which is something I hope to do in the months, if not years, ahead.
customer_reviews.author: JerryinMA

customer_reviews.title: A Beautiful and Quality wine decanter.
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the quality of this decanter. A winner! Recommended to anyone looking for this. Holds a full 750ml bottle in the base. No imperfections or blemishes.

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves to drink and serve wine. This piece is beautiful and delicate. I think she will like it.

customer_reviews.title: Great housewarming gift with a good bottle of red!
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my son for his housewarming and he loves it. Makes a great piece on the shelf when not in use, really helps a drop red wine blossom open.

customer_reviews.title: Great piece
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, not too thin crystal. I was worried if it would be too fragile, but was pleasantly surprised.

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with your wine decanter
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with your wine decanter. It is exactly what I have been looking for. Easy to pour in from a bottle easier to pour back in the bottle. Nice thin glass gives it an attractive appearance.

customer_reviews.title: Not the Decanter for Magnums
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful decanter, but I was looking for a decanter for 1.5L bottles. The decanter probably does hold 1800mL if you fill it to the brim, but that is not the point of decanting. I am returning it can ordering something larger.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Decanter
customer_reviews.text: I got this decanter for my father, who wanted something nicer to put “less expensive” bottles of wine in at parties. It works perfectly, is stable and sturdy, and it’s worked wonders! People think he’s so fancy now!

customer_reviews.text: What's great is that it's not too heavy, but it's sturdy enough not to break. Additionally, despite its interesting form, it does a great job of aerating the wine. Serving the wine from it is a completely new experience that you are really going to enjoy because it looks like an art.

customer_reviews.text: This makes all wine look excellent. It has impressed all of my guests so far. I just love how the wine swirls as it's poured into the decanter.

customer_reviews.text: I love it until it shattered just by placing it on my counter top.

customer_reviews.title: Best one out there, hands down!

customer_reviews.title: Great Design but too thin of crystal

customer_reviews.text: You'd think a design as unique as this one wouldn't have any functional properties, but I can assure you that that's not the case! For instance, the spout actually prevents both dripping and spilling whenever you pour wine.

customer_reviews.text: Although it's considerably light, there's no need to panic over it being too fragile, but on the contrary, it's actually quite sturdy. A great bonus to its weight is how easy it is to pour wine out of it.

customer_reviews.title: Great when you have company over
customer_reviews.text: I always use this decanter whenever I have guests over because it takes the atmosphere up a notch. I'm always getting compliments for it, too.

customer_reviews.text: Easy pour to the last drop. Using it at home. Hard to dry inside. Very fragile didnt last 6 months

customer_reviews.text: This product was bought as a house warming present. Our friends loved it and we have used it with them since a few times. =)

customer_reviews.title: Transforms your drinking experience
customer_reviews.text: This completely transforms your drinking experience rather than just drinking from the bottle. Also, it's not too delicate , so there's no need to be extra gentle with it.

customer_reviews.text: I think this is my favorite decanter that I've ever had to pour my wine. It's a great addition to the table and it functions really well, too.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my collection
customer_reviews.text: This decanter design is just to die for. It's become a great addition to my decanter collection. i think it's my favorite right now.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy glass, so it won't crack
customer_reviews.text: This decanter is very quality made. The glass is actually pretty sturdy so there's no need to be afraid that it'll crack.

customer_reviews.title: this decanter is beautiful! I am very satisfied with your products
customer_reviews.text: this decanter is beautiful! I am very satisfied with your products. Do you have a Swan decanter?
customer_reviews.author: valkyr branker

customer_reviews.title: A bit hard to clean, but looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. A bit hard to clean, but worth the trouble
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Gets compliments from guests all the time
customer_reviews.text: Our guests always compliment how nice it looks. The picture is what it looks like with a full 750 ml bottle in it. It is quite fragile though, you need to be careful with it. When we're done with it we immediately fill it with water to prevent the wine from sitting and potentially staining it. To wash we just put soapy water in it and gently swish it around. As long as you don't man-handle it it's perfectly fine. You can spend a lot more and get a Riedel or other fancy brand but the wine won't taste any better, and with the money you save you can buy more wine.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Too light, too fragile, too tall
customer_reviews.text: I wish I’d sent this back. This decanter is too light even with some wine in it. It is also not sturdy. It is just a matter of time before it will fall over. I live in a 5100 sq ft home and this decanter is so tall that it wouldn’t fit anywhere in this house. Of all the cabinets that we had, none were tall enough to fit an item like this. And because it’s so light and fragile you can’t put it outside a closed cabinet. I finally put in in an antique and a drawer hit it and it chipped. It’s going in the trash. I strongly believe most of the reviews on this item are fake!!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Functional
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my parents., who love red wine, and they are so happy with it. It works well and it looks beautiful out on the table when they are serving wine to company. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful disguise for serving (delicious!) Black Box Malbec
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! Excellent quality, and works beautifully. I'm glad I got this model which holds more wine. It's a showpiece. I didn't expect it to be such a conversation piece at gatherings--I just wanted to get the box of wine off the beverage table. This turned out to be a fun as well as functional decanter!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The decanter is a beautiful gift !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my wine lover grandma this Christmas, I was hesitant at first but she seemed to really love it and claims she will use it when she hosts her many dinner parties! I'm excited about the purchase and could see myself buying one for my home in the future. The product came well packaged and the decanter is beautiful =)

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice decanter for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This decanter functions perfectly. I gave it 4 stars only because of the shape - it's difficult to store anywhere. I would recommend it, if you have a good place to keep it when not in use.

customer_reviews.title: Modern and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We love this decanter! It is lightweight and fun to use. Note it's very delicate, so be careful when using and washing. It is once of those things we keep out on display on our bar because it's so eye-catching and beautiful. We would recommend this for anyone looking to make a splash with a more interesting decanter.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but not practical.
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice looking decanter, but it breaks too easily. Mine broke after less than 5 uses.

customer_reviews.text: The decanter is very nice looking, very functional, and the price is unreal, this is the third one I bought, 2 for me, 1 for gift.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and works well

customer_reviews.title: The spout prevents dripping!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this U-shape design. The spout is great since it prevents dripping and spilling when pouring wine.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I got it as a gift but for what I see it looks very nice .

customer_reviews.title: This looks great on the table!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. She Loved the shape and it is very easy to hold Also like the amount of wine it holds She hasn't tried pouring from it yet. I would buy this again for myself or for another gift. The price was right!
